unnormalised: Arre bhai, civil kaideantle he property-che zhogde kednaim sonponk naslolyanchi natkam! Mhojea chachacho case 2005 vorsa thaun chol'ta – azun legit nirnnoyachi vatt pollounk zai. Adv. Sharma sodanch mhunta "fuddli tareek, fuddli tareek," ani chacho vakilanchea chaea ani samosachea khorchak Rs. 5000 dit ravta. Distam mhaka fokot chaevale zikhtat! Komedich zalear legit, umed asa 2030 adim to solve zatolo, nam tor tachea natvank zomin bodlek case mellttolo. LOL!
normalised: Arre bhai, civil kānūna khaltelea propertiche zhogde mhonllear kedinch somponk nāslele nāṭak! Mhojea chacheacho case don hazār āni panch vorsā sāun chol'lā – azunui nirṇayak rāvtā. Advocate Sharma sodanch mhontā "fuddli sunavṇi, fuddli sunavṇi," āni chacho vakilānk chā āni samosāk panch hazār rupiye khorch kortā. Distā ki jikpi fakt chāvalech āsāt! Khorench, ās korta ki don hazār āni tis mhorea poilim to sodoun kāḍta, nā tor tachim nātū zomnicher case vortele. L-O-L!
